body_html: I've written up a change internally that makes Bazel build libcurl from scratch. This is one of the most challenging vendor libraries we've dealt with so far. libcurl has a pretty large set of configure defines. We're getting more eyes on the BUILD file we've written to make sure we're doing it correctly. I can't make any promises this is going to work. But with a little bit of luck, this change might be good enough to be merged. Then no one should hopefully need to worry about curl again.
